title: In the Beginning
description: In the beginning God created the heavens and earth. Then God created man and woman, man was not satisfied with his first mate, so Eve was created.Then jealousy reared her evil head and the first sin. Less Man and woman sinned and God sent them out of the Garden.But what you thought of the bible is about to change, there is more to the story. Lilith and her Archangel will begin a path to redeem mankind and save the universe
author: J.M. Schroder
